maqras.text: My delivered Dieta Izrael sea Pharaoh jeho troops pursued them aggressively sinfully. When drowning became reality him he said ja verit there nie bol god except Jeden Dieta Izrael verit; ja bol submitter
I neskoro! Ona rebelled already zvolit si bol transgressor
Dnes my zavarit tvoj zbor set ona mat rad lekcia buduci generations Unfortunately vela ludia bol totally oblivious do our znamenie
My endowed Dieta z Izrael position z honor zehnat them dobry provisions lenze they disputed when this znalost pojdem them. Tvoj Lord judge them Dni Vzkriesenie everything they disputed
Ona have any doubt zretel co revealed ona tvoj Lord potom ziadat those read previous scripture. Indeed truth pojdem ona tvoj Lord robi nie bol doubters
Nor shall ona join those zamietnut GOD's revelations lest ona bol losers
Iste those condemned by decree z tvoj Lord nie verit
Ziaden zalezitost co laskavy z proof ona show them (they nie verit) until they see painful retribution
Any obec verit iste rewarded for verit! For vzor, ludia Jonah when they verit my relieved humiliating retribution they suffering v this world my robit them prosperous
Had tvoj Lord willed all ludia zem verit. Ona chudoba force ludia robit become believers
Ziaden soul verit except v accordance s GOD's will He miesto curse upon those refuse chapat
Say Look o all znamenie heavens zem. All proofs all warnings never pomoc ludia decided disbelieve
they expect fate ich counterparts v the minuly? Say Iba caka ona ja i cakat
My ultimately save our posol those verit. bol our immutable zakon my save believers
Say O zaludnit ona have any doubt moj nabozenstvo ja nie kult co ona kult GOD Ja kult GOD alone Jeden zakoncit tvoj zivot. Ja commanded bol believer
Ja commanded Keep devoted do nabozenstvo monotheism ona nie practice idol kult
Ona nie kult GOD co nie possesses power benefit ona harm ona! Ona robit ona bol transgressor
GOD touches ona hardship ziaden relieve it except He. A when He zehnat ona nie force zamedzit Jeho grace He bestows it whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants. He bol Forgiver Merciful
Proclaim O ludia truth pojdem ona tu tvoj Lord Whoever guided guided jeho own dobre whoever ist astray ist astray jeho own detriment! Ja nie bol guardian over ona
Nasledovat co revealed ona bol chory GOD issues Jeho judgment He bol dobry judge
A L. R. This bol scripture verses zdokonalit potom elucidated It pojdem z Wise Cognizant
Proclaiming Ona nie kult GOD Ja pojdem ona Him warner i mat rad bearer z dobry zvest

Ona seek tvoj Lord's forgiveness potom repent Him. He will potom zehnat ty generously for predetermined period bestow Jeho grace upon those zasluzit it Ona turn potom ja fear for ona retribution awesome dni
Do GOD bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok He bol Omnipotent
Indeed they zatajit ich innermost thoughts mat rad if keep Him z zauzlit them! Skutocne mat rad they pokryvka ich clothes He zauzlit all ich secrets declarations. He zauzlit innermost thoughts
